"MOTHER RUSSIA",2005,3
The blood-soaked conclusion to "Mother Russia": It's missiles over Moscow as Frank Castle looks to destroy a deadly retrovirus buried deep in the bowels of a Russian missile silo. Part 6 (of 6).
32 PGS./Parental Advisory ...$2.99
